exceptions.exn: In environment l, q : nat Hl : 0 < l Hlq : l + 1 < q Hq : 1 <= q Hq' : 0 < 4 * q r := power (4 * q) 2 : nat Hr' : 4 <= r Hr : 2 <= r n, w : nat Hw : w = ∑ n (fun i : nat => power i r) Unable to unify "w = ∑ n (fun i : nat => 1 * power i r)" with "2 * ∑ n (fun i : nat => power i r) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => 2 * power i r)".

original: rewrite Hw. apply Hw_0. rewrite Hw_1. apply all_ones_joins. apply sum_powers_ortho. apply Hq'. intros. apply all_ones_equation. auto. apply double_sum_powers_ortho. apply Hq. apply Hq'. intros. apply sum_power_binary_lt. apply Hq. apply Hq'. apply Hw_0. rewrite Hw_1. apply sum_powers_ortho. apply Hq'. intros. apply all_ones_equation. auto. apply double_sum_powers_ortho. apply Hq. apply Hq'. rewrite Hw. apply Hw_0. apply all_ones_joins. rewrite Hw_1. apply sum_powers_ortho. apply Hq'. intros. apply all_ones_equation. auto. apply double_sum_powers_ortho. apply Hq. apply Hq'.
